description: Associates an Identity and Access Management (IAM) role with a DB cluster.

parameters.name: DBClusterIdentifier
parameters.description: The name of the DB cluster to associate the IAM role with.

parameters.name: RoleArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role to associate with the Aurora DB cluster, for example arn:aws:iam::123456789012:role/AuroraAccessRole.
